name: CoccidioidomycosisTestsForCoccidioidesSpeciesNucleicAcid
title: Coccidioidomycosis (Tests for Coccidioides species Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Coccidioides species nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Coccidioides sp probe),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
